text: avar parayunnu: "i kalikalute vayarukalilullat nannalile anunnalkk matramullatan. nannalute bharyamarkk at nisid'dhaman.â€ ennal at savamanenkil avarellam atil pankalikalakum. tirccayayum avarute i ketticcamakkalukalkk allahu anuyeajyamaya pratiphalam vaikate nalkum. sansayamilla; avan yuktimanum ellam ariyunnavanuman
